Planet Comics [microform] -- New York : Love Romances, 1940-1953. -- col. ill. ; 26 cm. -- Published no. 1 (Jan. 1940) - no. 73 (1953) -- Microfilm. St. Clair Shores, Mich. : J. Bails. -- positive ; 16 mm. -- (Jerry Bails Microfilm Library of Comic Art) -- Science fiction anthology. -- LIBRARY HAS: no. 1-73. -- Call no.: Film 15791

Distribution on microfilm reels:

  • no. 1-5, r. 137
  • no. 6-10: r. 134
  • no. 11-15: r. 128
  • no. 16-20: r. 93
  • no. 21-31: r. 140
  • no. 32-38: r. 150
  • no. 39-44: r. 118
  • no. 45-49: r. 82
  • no. 50-56: r. 90
  • no. 57-63: r. 91
  • no. 64-73: r. 192

Please scroll down for outline contents of each issue. Features in this comic book include:
  • Amazona, the Mighty Woman (issue 3)
  • Auro, Lord of Jupiter (issues 1-7, 11-29, 41-61)
  • Buzz Crandall, of the Space Patrol (issues 1-14)
  • Captain Nelson Cole of the Solar Air Force (issues 1-14)
  • Cosmo Corrigan (issues 9-11)
  • Crash Barker (issues 6-8)
  • Crash Parker (issues 9-16)
  • Don Granval (issues 6-11)
  • Fero, Interplanetary Detective (issues 5-8)
  • Flint Baker (issues 1-25, 66-67, 69)
  • Futura (issues 43-64)
  • Gale Allen and the Girl Squadron (issues 4-42, 65-66, 68-70)
  • Jeff Drake (issues 14-19)
  • Jim Giant (issue 4)
  • Kenny Carr (issue 4)
  • Life on Other Worlds (issues 33-35, 43-47, 49-51, 54-61, 64)
  • The Lost World, Starring Hunt Bowman (issues 21-68, 70)
  • Mars, God of War (issues 15-35, 66, 69)
  • Mysta, of the Moon (issues 36-62, 68)
  • Norge Benson (issues 12-32)
  • Planet Payson (issues 2, 6-8)
  • Planetoid X (issues 71-72)
  • Quorak, Space Pirate (issue 1)
  • The Red Comet (issues 1-20, 37, 69)
  • Reef Ryan (issues 13-25, 65, 67)
  • Space Admiral Curry (issue 5)
  • The Space Rangers (Flint Baker and Reef Ryan) (issues 26-37, 39-61, 63-64, 68, 70-71)
  • Spurt Hammond (issues 1-12)
  • The Star Pirate (issues 12-65, 67-68, 70)
This list originates from the one in Howard Keltner's Index to Golden Age Comic Books (Detroit, Mich. : J. Bails, 1976)
